text: hello~ my apologies for butting in but is outlook 2016 the same as Outlook office 365? because im also experiencing a lot of email template problems using HubSpot email.

Outlook 2016 and 365 are different. Outlook is notorious for its rendering issues. Its not a HubSpot specific thing its an outlook specific thing. Outlook doesn't use a browser rendering engine to display emails. It uses the Microsoft word rendering engine. With the exception of 365 in the browser.
